Activity: Arrive at the office. Coffee time! Check emails, address any urgent items from yesterday.
Review notes from yesterday's playtest and the email feedback from @Ldes-1.
Continue refining the level blockout based on feedback. Focus on addressing the specific issues identified yesterday. Expand the size of cramped areas, add more detail to boring areas.

Start prototyping a simple gameplay scenario: enemy encounter. Add some basic AI enemies to a section of the level. Tweak their placement and behavior to create a challenging but fair encounter. Need to email @Sdes-1 later to ask for the enemy information. @Sdes-1 Subject: About the Enemy info for the Game.
Lunch Break. Grab some food with colleagues.
Continue prototyping the enemy encounter. Experiment with different enemy types, numbers, and formations. Add cover objects and traversal options for the player.
Time for some visual integration. Begin adding basic lighting to the level. Experiment with different light sources, colors, and intensities to create atmosphere.
Playtest the enemy encounter with the initial lighting setup. Adjust enemy placement, lighting, and gameplay to improve the overall experience.
Back up work and write a summary of progress. Send an email to @Ldes-1 with an update on level progress and ask for feedback on the enemy encounter.
